creator: michael.mangino@submitorder.com
text:
During use of a web application, screens from one user will sometimes be pre-
pended to another users display. I have a screenshot of this happening. I moved 
from 3.2.2 to 3.2.3, and added apache as a web server, but this did not appear 
to fix the problem. 

Unfortunately, I don't have any detailed information, and cannot reproduce at 
will, however it tends to happen several times per day. I don't know how 
accurate this is, but it seems to happen most often when users click the stop 
button.

This is an internal system, so it isn't a major problem. We cannot, however, 
move the control of our applications over to the web site until this stops 
happening, as we don't want the wrong person to be able to control our 
applications.

creator: william.barker@wilshire.com
text:
The good news is that this has been fixed for some time in 3.3.

I hadn't even realized that this bug had been ported to 3.2.
